nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Hullo.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I'm Jason Helios. I like work for like the Humane Society. I'm in charge of them animal rights at that prison thingy they're building.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Animals are the bestest, man. They're like better than humans.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: In movies, doesn't everyone cry when the dog dies, and not the people. I know what I'm talking about.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: So, what d'ya want?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: It's to hold some ancient evil dude who they imprisoned in a little crystal.

responses.text: What's this have to do with the humane society?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Like "them," you know. The Illuminati. The government. Take your pick.

responses.text: Aren't you being a bit paranoid?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I was kidding, man. It's both of them.

responses.text: Aren't you being a bit paranoid?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Shh...they might be watching.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: They were gonna use some animals as like guards and such. I'm here to make sure they're treated right.

responses.text: I don't think they're fed enough.
I don't think they're fed enough.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Why?

responses.text: You know, I just, like, feel it.
Someone told me the humans were going to steal all the food. Or, the Illuminati.
Animals can always use more food.
You know, I just, like, feel it.
Someone told me the humans were going to steal all the food. Or, the Illuminati.
Animals can always use more food.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: But...they haven't chosen the animals yet. What?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I'd push for more food, I really would, but there's not exactly an excess of food right now.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: The farmers aren't producing a lot right now. The mayor wouldn't let me reallocate food.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Yeah. That's a great idea. My dog, Rover, always likes more food.

responses.text: So, you'll get them more food?
"Rover" is the most generic dog name ever.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Yep will do.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Look. I don't go criticizing why you've got that giant hole in your chest. So leave me alone.

responses.text: So, you'll get the animals more food?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: So, you think I ought to give the animals more food?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: You're just confusing, man.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: What about them?

responses.text: How do you know that they're being treated right?
I don't think they should be allowed.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Pets need breaks, I suppose.

responses.text: And they need to play, right?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Right.

responses.text: So, shouldn't we make sure they get breaks?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Yeah. We ought to make them have the guards take a break and play with them.

responses.text: They should probably go outside so the animals get fresh air.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Good idea. How long should these breaks be?

responses.text: At least once a day for an hour.
Fifteen minutes three times per shift.
Fifteen minutes every hour on the hour.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Sounds good. I'll make sure it happens.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: That sounds kinda like a lot.

responses.text: But these animals are working hard.
On second thought...maybe we should look into other break times.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I guess you're right. I'll get the breaks in.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: Nah. They're just like pets. Pets will be fine.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I don't know. Make sure they got breaks and food and stuff. And are happy and all.

responses.text: How do you keep them happy?

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I like to sing them songs.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: I put in those breaks you wanted.

nodes.speaker: humane_society_guy
nodes.text: And that's why I'm going to get them more food like I said.
